markdownRemark.html:
“Mendicants, in the past … future … present sights, sounds, smells, tastes, touches, and thoughts are not-self …”

SN.35.207–209. Ajjhattātītādiyaṁdukkhasutta (“The Interior and What’s Suffering in the Three Times”)
